name: example
description: Example for the model to follow or emulate

name: input
description: Raw data or content to process

name: goal
description: The objective or end result desired

name: format
description: How the response should be structured

name: role
description: Who the model should act as

name: Current_Code
action: The feature is already implemented in the codebase and should not be re-developped

name: extract
description: What to pull from a source
action: the following should be extracted from the source

name: Ask
action: Questions to be asked before going further or coding

name: Dependency
description: This should be implemented before going into this section

name: Pain_Points
description: Painfull actions that needs to be improved

name: web_search
description: Indicates the AI should search the web for current information

name: Backward_Compatibility
description: Maintain backward compatibility with existing APIs, interfaces, and behaviors

name: No_Backward_Compatibility
description: Breaking changes are allowed; no need to maintain compatibility with previous versions

name: Fallback
description: Implement fallback mechanisms for error handling and graceful degradation

name: No_Fallback
description: No fallback needed; fail fast and let errors propagate

name: Precondition
description: Requirements that must be met before execution

name: data
description: Data structures, models, schemas, or datasets

name: actors
description: Involved parties, users, or systems in the scenario

name: success_flow
description: Main happy path - step-by-step expected behavior

name: exceptions
description: Error conditions, invalid states, and fallback actions

name: variants
description: Alternative paths, optional configurations, conditional behaviors

name: story
description: Short summary of the business need or problem being solved

name: error
description: Known errors, bugs, issues, or problematic behavior that needs to be fixed or addressed

name: payload
description: Data structure or message content sent to Chrome extension, browser APIs, or between components

name: debug_data
description: Debugging information, logs, trace data, or diagnostic details

name: test_case
description: Specific test scenario with inputs, expected outputs, and pass/fail criteria

name: mandatory
description: Required elements, non-negotiable features, or must-have functionality that cannot be omitted
